title: LEASING NOW! (Studio, 1br, 2br Apts)
posting_body: ['NEW UPDATED APARTMENTS CLOSE TO DOWNTOWN DETROIT - $700-875 monthly', '15395 Linwood St, Detroit, MI 48238', '4111 Midland, Detroit, MI 48238', '1890 Ewald Cir, Detroit, MI 48238', 'FEATURES', 'Bedrooms:', '1-2', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Located on Floor #:', '1', 'Floors in Bldg:', '3', 'Parking Spaces:', '1', 'Pets Allowed:', 'None', 'DESCRIPTION', 'These apartments have been refreshed throughout.', '\xa0 All units are large and spaceous.', '\xa0 On the Lodge Freeway conveniently located 10 minutes from downtown Detroit.', '\xa0 Lease up specials going on now!', '\xa0 Studios, 1br and 2br available.', '\xa0 CALL', 'show contact info', 'RENTAL UNIT AMENITIES', 'Refrigerator', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Stove', 'BUILDING AMENITIES', 'On-site Laundry', 'Security Cameras', 'Parking', 'OTHER DETAILS', 'Available Date:\xa0\xa0\xa0NOW', 'Included Utilities:\xa0\xa0\xa0WATER', 'CONTACT INFO', 'Gene', 'show contact info', 'Brookstone Apartments']
